text: Allopocockiidae is a family of millipedes in the order Spirobolida. There are about five genera and eight described species in Allopocockiidae. ==Genera== * Allopocockia Brolemann, 1913 * Anelus Cook, 1911 * Arolus Chamberlin, 1922 * Chelogonobolus Carl, 1919 * Schmidtolus Chamberlin, 1953 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Spirobolida Category:Millipede families
title: Allopocockiidae
